acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should throw an exception if the @PodamStrategyValue annotation contains the wrong strateg type
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldThrowExceptionWhenPodamStrategyValueContainsInvalidStrategy

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.annotations.StringWithWrongStrategyTypePojo
test-step.error: The type of the Podam Attribute Strategy is not java.lang.String but uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.OneDimensionalTestPojo. An exception will be thrown.
test-step.exception: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException:The type of the Podam Attribute Strategy is not java.lang.String but uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.OneDimensionalTestPojo. An exception will be thrown. [uk.co.jemos.podam.api.PodamFactoryImpl.returnAttributeDataStrategyValue(PodamFactoryImpl.java:3127), uk.co.jemos.podam.api.PodamFactoryImpl.populatePojoInternal(PodamFactoryImpl.java:1355), uk.co.jemos.podam.api.PodamFactoryImpl.manufacturePojoInternal(PodamFactoryImpl.java:1244), uk.co.jemos.podam.api.PodamFactoryImpl.manufacturePojo(PodamFactoryImpl.java:175), uk.co.jemos.podam.test.unit.steps.PodamInvocationSteps.whenIInvokeTheFactoryForClass(PodamInvocationSteps.java:13), uk.co.jemos.podam.test.unit.features.annotations.AnnotationsTest.podamShouldThrowExceptionWhenPodamStrategyValueContainsInvalidStrategy(AnnotationsTest.java:555)]
